meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be summed up or added together.
meanings.sent1: Her summabilities in math made her a top student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The summabilities of the ingredients in the recipe determine its final taste.
meanings.sent3: The summabilities of the puzzle pieces made it easy for him to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: His summabilities in organizing events were like pieces of a puzzle coming together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The summabilities of the team members created a harmonious and efficient work environment.

meanings.definition: The ability to be combined or totaled.
meanings.sent1: The summabilities of the different colors resulted in a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: When calculating expenses, it's important to consider the summabilities of all costs.
meanings.sent3: The summabilities of the flavors in the dish surprised and delighted the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her summabilities in managing resources were like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The summabilities of the various skills in the team made them unbeatable in the competition.
